properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 b1 c1 e1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
I'm forgiven
Because You were forsaken
I'm accepted
You were condemned
I'm alive and well
Your Spirit lives within me
Because You died
And rose again

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Amazing love
How can it be
That You my King
Would die for me
Amazing love
I know it's true
It's my joy to honor You
In all I do to honor You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I'm forgiven
Because You were forsaken
I'm accepted
You were condemned
I'm alive and well
Your Spirit lives within me
Because You died
And rose again

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
You are my King
You are my King
Jesus You are my King
Jesus You are my King

verse.name: e1
verse.lines: In all I do to honor You x2
